caption.p: Crystal structures of coronavirus receptor binding domains (RBDs) complexed with their receptors. To date, the crystal structures of three coronavirus Spike RBD–receptor complexes have been solved: (a) the RBDs of SARS complexed with human ACE2 (pdb 2AJF) [ 73], (b) NL63 complexed with human ACE2 (3KBH) [ 71 •• ], and (c) MHV complexed with murine CEACAM11a (3R4D) [ 43].
